p: Each test solution (0.3 mL) was mixed with 3 mL of reagent solution (0.6 M sulfuric acid, 28 mM sodium phosphate, and 4 mM ammonium molybdate). The sample absorbance was read at 695 nm after 90 min incubation at 95 Â°C. Results are expressed as millimoles of trolox equivalent per gram of dry extract (TEs/g extract) [ 21].
